metadata.description: The name of the publisher app
The name of the key vault
Maximum number of runs pipelines will run in parallel

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM dbo.Release WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Id = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')

SELECT * FROM dbo.Filter WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE RS.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterGroup WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FilterId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.Filter WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE RS.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version)))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterItem WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FilterGroupId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.FilterGroup WHERE FilterId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.Filter WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE RS.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version))))

SELECT * FROM dbo.IndicatorGroup WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE RS.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version))

SELECT * FROM dbo.Indicator WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE IndicatorGroupId IN (SELECT Id FROM dbo.IndicatorGroup WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject WHERE ReleaseId != RS.ReleaseId AND SubjectId = RS.SubjectId)))

SELECT * FROM dbo.Location WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Id IN (SELECT LocationId FROM dbo.Observation WHERE SubjectId in (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version)))

SELECT * FROM dbo.Subject WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Id IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE RS.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN dbo.Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version))

SELECT * FROM dbo.Observation WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE RS.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version))

SELECT * FROM dbo.ObservationFilterItem WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ObservationId IN (SELECT Id FROM Observation WHERE SubjectId IN (SELECT SubjectId FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject RS JOIN Release R ON R.Id = RS.ReleaseId WHERE RS.ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseSubject RS2 JOIN Release R2 ON R2.Id = RS2.ReleaseId WHERE RS2.SubjectId = RS.SubjectId AND R2.Version < R.Version)))
SELECT * FROM dbo.ReleaseSubject WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')

SELECT * FROM dbo.Footnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE Id IN (SELECT FootnoteId FROM dbo.ReleaseFootnote RF WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseFootnote WHERE ReleaseId != RF.ReleaseId AND FootnoteId = RF.FootnoteId))

SELECT * FROM dbo.SubjectFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FootnoteId IN (SELECT FootnoteId FROM dbo.ReleaseFootnote RF WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseFootnote WHERE ReleaseId != RF.ReleaseId AND FootnoteId = RF.FootnoteId))

SELECT * FROM dbo.IndicatorFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FootnoteId IN (SELECT FootnoteId FROM dbo.ReleaseFootnote RF WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseFootnote WHERE ReleaseId != RF.ReleaseId AND FootnoteId = RF.FootnoteId))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FootnoteId IN (SELECT FootnoteId FROM dbo.ReleaseFootnote RF WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseFootnote WHERE ReleaseId != RF.ReleaseId AND FootnoteId = RF.FootnoteId))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterGroupFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FootnoteId IN (SELECT FootnoteId FROM dbo.ReleaseFootnote RF WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseFootnote WHERE ReleaseId != RF.ReleaseId AND FootnoteId = RF.FootnoteId))

SELECT * FROM dbo.FilterItemFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FootnoteId IN (SELECT FootnoteId FROM dbo.ReleaseFootnote RF WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM ReleaseFootnote WHERE ReleaseId != RF.ReleaseId AND FootnoteId = RF.FootnoteId))
SELECT * FROM dbo.ReleaseFootnote WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ReleaseId = CONVERT(UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, '@{pipeline().parameters.releaseId}')
